channel.title: CVE Feed for Enbra -- EWM 1.7.29
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Enbra -- EWM 1.7.29

item.title: CVE-2021-34572|2024-08-04T00:19:47.009Z -- enbra -- ewm%201.7.29
item.description: Enbra EWM 1.7.29 does not check for or detect replay attacks sent by wireless M-Bus Security mode 5 devices. Instead timestamps of the sensor are replaced by the time of the readout even if the data is a replay of earlier data.
